properties.title: Lidernenhütte SAC
properties.description: The cabin in the wood chalet style, located in the little known Riemenstaldner Tal, is an ideal base for training courses, climbing and ski mountaineering camps, igloo building and childrens’ climbing workshops as well as for schools, seminars and family vacations. Moreover, it offers easy ascents and interesting col crossings towards Muotatal, Schächental, Urnersee and Spilauer Bergsee. The access with the adventurous open-air cable car Chäppeliberg – Spilau is easy.
